    "formula": [
        "G.f.: (-360x^2 + 96x) / (-144x^4 + 240x^3 - 115x^2 + 20x - 1).",
        "G.f.: 24*x*(4 - 15*x)/((1 - x)*(1 - 3*x)*(1 - 4*x)*(1 - 12*x)). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 04 2018",
        "a(n) = 20*a(n-1) - 115*a(n-2) + 240*a(n-3) - 144*a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 04 2018"
    ],

        "LinearRecurrence[{20,  -115, 240, -144}, {0, 96, 1560, 20160}, 40] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 04 2018 *)"
    ],

        "(PARI) concat([0], Vec(24*(4 - 15*x)/((1 - x)*(1 - 3*x)*(1 - 4*x)*(1 - 12*x)) + O(x^20))) \\\\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 04 2018",
        "(Magma) I:=[0,96,1560,20160]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 20*Self(n-1)- 115*Self(n-2)+240*Self(n-3)-144*Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 04 2018"
